attributes.action: Coffee cup ban from all big brands to avoid usage of non recyclable coffee cups.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, in particular we aren't sure what you'd classify as a 'big brand'. 

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244596
